title: I want to discuss a problem someone help please.!!
body: 1. hello a moment ago I was at the game and closed the Internet(out of the blue closed the adsl) was not my fault and now threw leaver buster(ban) at 5 games please much can I remove it because it is not my fault please answer me if it's possible. Thanks:)

replies.body:
Regardless of intent, your absence from the match negatively impacts **everyone in the match**. This is a reason as to why the system treats all disconnections equally and why we're unable to remove or modify Leaverbuster penalties.

Additionally, a 5-game penalty can never occur from a single disconnection and would only show up on your account after a **recent and consistent trend of disconnections**. If your modem or router are having issues, you may want to reach out to your Internet Service Provider (ISP) so they can help you sort that out before playing any more League matches.

If you have any questions, let me know.
